required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Multiple Ascending Dose Study With LY03003 in Patients With Early-stage Parkinson's Disease
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-blinded, Multiple Ascending Dose Study in Patients With Early-stage Parkinson's Disease to Evaluate the Pharmacokinetics and Safety of LY03003 Following Intramuscular Injections

brief_summary.textblock: This study is to evaluate the safety and tolerability and to characterize the pharmacokinetics of multiple ascending dose (MAD) of LY03003 following intramuscular injections.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.description: Adverse events to evaluate the safety and tolerability of LY03003

secondary_outcome.measure: Time of maximum concentration (Tmax) of total LY03003
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the first injection of stable doses up to day 50

secondary_outcome.measure: Maximum concentration in plasma (Cmax) of total LY03003
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the first injection of stable doses up to day 50

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration-time curve (AUC) from zero up to the last measured concentration [AUC (0-t)] of LY03003
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the first injection of stable doses up to day 50

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration-time curve (AUC) from time zero up to the infinite time [AUC (0-∞)] of LY03003
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the first injection of stable doses up to day 50

secondary_outcome.measure: Apparent volume of distribution (Vd) of LY03003
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the first injection of stable doses up to day 50
From the first injection of stable doses up to day 50
From the first injection of stable doses up to day 50

secondary_outcome.measure: Maximum steady-state drug concentration of LY03003
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the first injection of stable doses up to day 50

secondary_outcome.measure: Minimum steady-state drug concentration of LY03003
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the first injection of stable doses up to day 50
From the first injection of stable doses up to day 50

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration-time curve (AUC) at steady-state concentration of LY03003
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the first injection of stable doses up to day 50

secondary_outcome.measure: Fluctuation degree in steady-state concentration of LY03003
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the first injection of stable doses up to day 50

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline to the end of the treatment period in the Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale (UPDRS) part (Ⅱ+Ⅲ) Total Score
secondary_outcome.description: The Unified Parkinson´s Disease Rating Scale Part Ⅱ measures "Activities in Daily Living". The total score ranges from 0 (Best score possible) to 52 (Worst score possible). The Unified Parkinson´s Disease Rating Scale Part Ⅲ is an accepted and validated scale for the assessment of motor function in Parkinson´s disease. Each of the 27 sub-items in the UPDRS III is measured on a scale of 0 to 4, where 0 is normal and 4 represents severe abnormalities. The total scores therefore ranges from 0 to 108.

intervention.description: Patients to be enrolled to 70 mg dose group will receive 14 mg in the first week, 28 mg in the second week, 42 mg in the third week,56 mg in the fourth week and then 70 mg in the next 5 weeks. Patients to be enrolled to 84 mg dose group will receive 14 mg in the first week, 28 mg in the second week, 42 mg in the third week,56 mg in the fourth week, 70mg in the fifth week and then 84 mg in the next 5 weeks.

Patients to be enrolled to 70 mg dose group will receive 14 mg in the first week, 28 mg in the second week, 42 mg in the third week,56 mg in the fourth week and then 70 mg in the next 5 weeks. Patients to be enrolled to 84 mg dose group will receive 14 mg in the first week, 28 mg in the second week, 42 mg in the third week,56 mg in the fourth week, 70mg in the fifth week and then 84 mg in the next 5 weeks.

facility.name: Shengjing Hospital of China Medical University
